verses.name: Hebrews 1:8
verses.text: But unto the Son he saith, Thy throne, O God, is for ever and ever: a sceptre of righteousness is the sceptre of thy kingdom.

verses.name: Hebrews 1:9
verses.text: Thou hast loved righteousness, and hated iniquity; therefore God, even thy God, hath anointed thee with the oil of gladness above thy fellows.

verses.name: Hebrews 1:10
verses.text: And, Thou, Lord, in the beginning hast laid the foundation of the earth; and the heavens are the works of thine hands:

verses.name: Hebrews 1:11
verses.text: They shall perish; but thou remainest; and they all shall wax old as doth a garment;
